overview: On the occasion of the 85th anniversary of the death of Eleftherios Venizelos on March 18, 1936, the National Foundation for Research and Studies "Eleftherios K. Venizelos" made a short film starring Grigoris Valtinos.

production_companies.name: National Foundation for Research and Studies "Eleftherios K. Venizelos"

title: 85 Years Without Eleftherios Venizelos
